dmca.title: U.K. individual complains of defamation
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs

RE: Our Client - [Private]
You will recall that we have written to you about this matter in the past.

Proceedings are continuing against [Private] In the meantime, he is continuing to publish defamatory allegations against our client, including defamation snippets through the Google web site. This can be found on

[redacted]
